profile.name: Wes Bos
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Building innovative tools and utilities for developers
profile.summary: Highly skilled developer with a passion for creating cutting-edge projects. Proficient in a wide range of programming languages, including TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. With a strong focus on problem-solving and attention to detail, I've developed a reputation for delivering high-quality solutions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented low-boilerplate RPC systems using JavaScript/TypeScript-native object-capability RPC system (CapnWeb)
Developed AI-powered projects, including an AI-generated 3D eyeball thing and a voice-activated sticker dreamer and printer

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom web components for audio and video player controls using TypeScript

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of various open-source projects, including database sharding and web components
